location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Summaries of official secret despatches from the Government of India, the Government of Bombay, HM Minister to Persia, and HM Consul at Tehran

physicalDescription.extent: The papers have been arranged into bundles tied with silk ribbons; each bundle summarises correspondence received on a given date. These bundles have been arranged in chronological order.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the first folio with 1, and terminates at the last folio with 80; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file consists of summaries of official secret despatches from the Government of India, the Government of Bombay, and British diplomatic and consular representatives to Persia, relating to Pegu, Punjab, Herat, Sind, Aden, Nepal, Turkey, the Persian Gulf, Afghanistan, Kelat, and the Slave Trade.The date range gives the creation date of the summaries, but the summaries themselves refer to correspondence of an earlier date.
